titleInfo.title: [Letter] ca. 1850 Feb. 13, Aztalan, Wisconsin [to] A. Fergusson, Carthage, Tenn[essee] / H. S. Howell

mods.abstract: This is a letter from H. S. Howell to Adam Fergusson, dated February 13. It was written in the late 1840's. Howell asks for Fergusson's help in a deal Howell made with H. H. Holland, Buck Hart, and Mr. Farley. Howell writes that he misses Tennessee, and that it was the happiest time of his life. He writes that he likes Wisconsin partly because it is a Democratic state. Howell is disappointed that the Whig party won the last election. He hopes they will not reverse the decisions, policies, and laws of the previous administration.
